title: Note- Both the smoke check lobby with evacuation lift shall have positive level difference of minimum 75 mm with respect to staircase landing or mid- landing level to avoid ingress of water in fireman lift shaft
clause_text: Note- Both the smoke check lobby with evacuation lift shall have positive level difference of minimum 75 mm with respect to staircase landing or mid- landing level to avoid ingress of water in fireman lift shaft.
section: Fire Escape Chutes/ Controlled Lowering Device for evacuation-
